'''Wellspring of Healing ''' is the first act of [[Barbara]]'s [[Hangout Event]]. In order to unlock this quest line, the player needs 2 [[Story Key]]s, must have completed [[Prologue]] Act III: [[Song of the Dragon and Freedom]], and reached [[Adventure Rank]] 26.

During the act, Sister [[Victoria]] is concerned about Barbara and asked the [[Traveler]] to find her.
